  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_92339</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_92339</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Test for gases  carbon dioxide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Prüfen Sie auf Gaskohlendioxyd</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Déterminez l'anhydride carbonique de gaz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Teste para o dióxido de carbono dos gáses</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esamini ad anidride carbonica dei gas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δοκιμή για το διοξείδιο του άνθρακα αερίων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Pruebe para el bióxido de carbono de los gases</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">First of three illustrations discussing test for gases. This illustration shows how to test for carbon dioxide based on its reaction with lime water.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Carbon dioxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical reaction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lime water</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">test</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zuerst von drei Abbildungen, die Test für Gase 
behandeln. Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie man auf das Kohlendioxyd 
prüft, das auf seiner Reaktion mit Kalkwasser basiert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">D'abord de trois illustrations discutant l'essai 
pour des gaz. Cette illustration montre comment déterminer 
l'anhydride carbonique basé sur sa réaction à l'eau de chaux.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primeiramente de três ilustrações que discutem 
o teste para gáses. Esta ilustração mostra como testar para o
dióxido de carbono baseado em sua reação com água de cal.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In primo luogo di tre illustrazioni che discutono 
prova per i gas. Questa illustrazione mostra come esaminare ad 
anidride carbonica basata sulla relativa reazione con l'acqua di 
calce.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρώτα τριών απεικονίσεων που συζητούν τη δοκιμή για 
τα αέρια. Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς να εξετάσει 
για το διοξείδιο του άνθρακα βασισμένο στην αντίδρασή της με το 
ύδωρ ασβέστη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Primero de tres ilustraciones que discuten la 
prueba para los gases. Esta ilustración muestra cómo probar 
para el bióxido de carbono basado en su reacción con agua de cal.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kohlendioxyd</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">chemische Reaktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kalkwasser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Test</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anhydride carbonique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">réaction chimique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">eau de chaux</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">essai</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dióxido de carbono</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">reação química</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">água de cal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">teste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Anidride carbonica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">reazione chimica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">acqua di calce</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">prova</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διοξείδιο του άνθρακα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χημική αντίδραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ύδωρ ασβέστη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
